        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/9da6b6453c6f2e83755251473b06d39627471a8c<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/9da6b6453c6f2e83755251473b06d39627471a8c"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/9da6b6453c6f2e83755251473b06d39627471a8c<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>9da6b6453c6f2e83755251473b06d39627471a8c<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/9da6b6453c6f2e83755251473b06d39627471a8c"><!---->9da6b6453c6f2e83755251473b06d39627471a8c<!----></a><br>Author: Toni Barzic <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Toni Barzic &lt;<!----></span>tbarzic@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/tbarzic@chromium.org"><!---->tbarzic@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Tue May 10 00:00:26 2022<span class="line"><!---->Date: Tue May 10 00:00:26 2022<!----></span><br><br>Speculative fix for UAF in video recording watcher<span class="line"><!---->Speculative fix for UAF in video recording watcher<!----></span><br><br>VideoRecordingWatcher schedules a timer to handle window size changes<span class="line"><!---->VideoRecordingWatcher schedules a timer to handle window size changes<!----></span><br>whenever recorded window size changes. When fired the timer callback<span class="line"><!---->whenever recorded window size changes. When fired the timer callback<!----></span><br>tries to get size from the recorded window, assuming that it's safe to<span class="line"><!---->tries to get size from the recorded window, assuming that it's safe to<!----></span><br>access the recorded window while video recording watcher is in scope.<span class="line"><!---->access the recorded window while video recording watcher is in scope.<!----></span><br>The video recording watcher observes the recorded window, and ends video<span class="line"><!---->The video recording watcher observes the recorded window, and ends video<!----></span><br>recording when the recoded window gets deleted (which ends up calling<span class="line"><!---->recording when the recoded window gets deleted (which ends up calling<!----></span><br>VideoRecordingWatcher::Shutdown()), but this does not delete the video<span class="line"><!---->VideoRecordingWatcher::Shutdown()), but this does not delete the video<!----></span><br>recording object immediately, so the window size change timer may<span class="line"><!---->recording object immediately, so the window size change timer may<!----></span><br>outlive the recorded window.<span class="line"><!---->outlive the recorded window.<!----></span><br><br>This CL stops the window size change throttle timer when the video<span class="line"><!---->This CL stops the window size change throttle timer when the video<!----></span><br>recording watcher is shutdown.<span class="line"><!---->recording watcher is shutdown.<!----></span><br><br>BUG=1323553<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1323553" title="Security:  heap-use-after-free  ash/shelf/hotseat_widget.cc (chromeOS)"><!---->BUG=1323553<!----></a><br><br>Change-Id: If374e44fe813eaa770a8d08aaa811fa2ce18da08<span class="line"><!---->Change-Id: If374e44fe813eaa770a8d08aaa811fa2ce18da08<!----></span><br>Reviewed-on: <span class="line"><!---->Reviewed-on: <!----></span>https://chromium-review.googlesource.com/c/chromium/src/+/3636561<a         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion.       <style>

          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);

          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: flex-start;
          flex-direction: column;
          margin: 0;
          box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        h3 {
          margin-top: 1em;
        }
        mr-description {
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        mr-edit-issue {
          margin-top: 40px;
        }
      </style>

        The following revision refers to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->The following revision refers to this bug:<!----></span><br>  <span class="line"><!---->  <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/9da6b6453c6f2e83755251473b06d39627471a8c<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/9da6b6453c6f2e83755251473b06d39627471a8c"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/9da6b6453c6f2e83755251473b06d39627471a8c<!----></a><br><br>commit <span class="line"><!---->commit <!----></span>9da6b6453c6f2e83755251473b06d39627471a8c<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://crrev.com/9da6b6453c6f2e83755251473b06d39627471a8c"><!---->9da6b6453c6f2e83755251473b06d39627471a8c<!----></a><br>Author: Toni Barzic <<span class="line"><!---->Author: Toni Barzic &lt;<!----></span>tbarzic@chromium.org<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="/u/tbarzic@chromium.org"><!---->tbarzic@chromium.org<!----></a>><span class="line"><!---->&gt;<!----></span><br>Date: Tue May 10 00:00:26 2022<span class="line"><!---->Date: Tue May 10 00:00:26 2022<!----></span><br><br>Speculative fix for UAF in video recording watcher<span class="line"><!---->Speculative fix for UAF in video recording watcher<!----></span><br><br>VideoRecordingWatcher schedules a timer to handle window size changes<span class="line"><!---->VideoRecordingWatcher schedules a timer to handle window size changes<!----></span><br>whenever recorded window size changes. When fired the timer callback<span class="line"><!---->whenever recorded window size changes. When fired the timer callback<!----></span><br>tries to get size from the recorded window, assuming that it's safe to<span class="line"><!---->tries to get size from the recorded window, assuming that it's safe to<!----></span><br>access the recorded window while video recording watcher is in scope.<span class="line"><!---->access the recorded window while video recording watcher is in scope.<!----></span><br>The video recording watcher observes the recorded window, and ends video<span class="line"><!---->The video recording watcher observes the recorded window, and ends video<!----></span><br>recording when the recoded window gets deleted (which ends up calling<span class="line"><!---->recording when the recoded window gets deleted (which ends up calling<!----></span><br>VideoRecordingWatcher::Shutdown()), but this does not delete the video<span class="line"><!---->VideoRecordingWatcher::Shutdown()), but this does not delete the video<!----></span><br>recording object immediately, so the window size change timer may<span class="line"><!---->recording object immediately, so the window size change timer may<!----></span><br>outlive the recorded window.<span class="line"><!---->outlive the recorded window.<!----></span><br><br>This CL stops the window size change throttle timer when the video<span class="line"><!---->This CL stops the window size change throttle timer when the video<!----></span><br>recording watcher is shutdown.<span class="line"><!---->recording watcher is shutdown.<!----></span><br><br>BUG=1323553<a class="strike-through" target="_blank" href="/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1323553" title="Security:  heap-use-after-free  ash/shelf/hotseat_widget.cc (chromeOS)"><!---->BUG=1323553<!----></a><br><br>Change-Id: If374e44fe813eaa770a8d08aaa811fa2ce18da08<span class="line"><!---->Change-Id:         *** Boilerplate reminders! ***<span class="line"><!---->*** Boilerplate reminders! ***<!----></span><br>Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users. Early public disclosure may cancel the provisional reward. Also, please be considerate about disclosure when the bug affects a core library that may be used by other products. Please do NOT share this information with third parties who are not directly involved in fixing the bug. Doing so may cancel the provisional reward. Please be honest if you have already disclosed anything publicly or to third parties. Lastly, we understand that some of you are not interested in money. We offer the option to donate your reward to an eligible charity. If you prefer this option, let us know and we will also match your donation - subject to our discretion. Any rewards that are unclaimed after 12 months will be donated to a charity of our choosing.<span class="line"><!---->Please do NOT publicly disclose details until a fix has been released to all our users.         mr-launch-overview {

           issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>
          
            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

        for LitElement.

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
